p: Additionally, for S-gene, per cent similarity range pattern was evaluated in amino acid based index where 2019-nCoV isolates from China and USA were 100% identical. The range varied between 81.2 to 81.8% and 77.0 to 78.1% for 2019-nCoV isolates with Bat_SARS-like CoVs and other SARS like CoVs, respectively. The per cent identity with human coronavirus isolate HCoV-OC43 was also found lower (28.0%) ( Supplementary data 2).
